mapper.sql: admin_id, name, password, phone, image, role, school_id, post
mapper.select: select admin_id as adminId, name, password, phone, image, role, school_id as schoolId, post from edu_admin where phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into edu_admin(name, password, phone, image, role, school_id, post) values (#{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{image}, #{role}, #{schoolId}, #{post})
mapper.update:
update edu_admin
name = #{name},
password = #{password},
phone = #{phone},
image = #{image},
role = #{role},
school_id = #{schoolId},
post = #{post},
where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.school_id schoolId, s.school_name as schoolName from edu_admin a LEFT JOIN edu_admin_school t on a.admin_id = t.admin_id LEFT JOIN edu_school s on t.school_id = s.school_id where a.phone = #{phone}
mapper.insert: insert into edu_admin_school(school_id, admin_id, role) values (#{schoolId}, #{adminId}, #{role})
mapper.delete: delete from edu_admin_school where admin_id = #{adminId} and school_id = #{schoolId}
